statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE sign_up_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE savings_plan_signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, savings_plan_signup_date FROM customer_information WHERE sign_up_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, savings_plan_signup_date FROM customer_information WHERE savings_plan_signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_amount FROM savings_plans WHERE plan_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS plan_count FROM savings_plans GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 10) AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, plan_name, plan_amount FROM savings_plans WHERE plan_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY plan_start_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.plan_name FROM customers c JOIN savings_plans s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.plan_start_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_name, s.plan_name, s.plan_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN savings_plans s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.plan_name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_type FROM savings_plans;
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, signup_date FROM customer_signups WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, signup_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_signups s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, signup_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_signups s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, signup_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_signups s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, plan_description, plan_percentage FROM savings_plans WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, savings_amount FROM customers c JOIN customer_savings s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT plan_id, action_type, action_date FROM plan_history ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT plan_name, plan_percentage FROM savings_plans WHERE is_active = TRUE;

SELECT customer_name, plan_name, savings_amount FROM customers JOIN customer_savings ON customers.customer_id = customer_savings.customer_id JOIN savings_plans ON customer_savings.plan_id = savings_plans.plan_id WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT plan_name, action_type, action_date FROM savings_plans JOIN plan_history ON savings_plans.plan_id = plan_history.plan_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM savings_plans WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN customer_savings ON customers.customer_id=customer_savings.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id=100
SELECT plan_name, description FROM savings_plans WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, subscription_date FROM customer_savings ORDER BY subscription_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id, plan_id
